title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Language Education Leadership Course Utilizing Empathy-Based Design Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Utilize the 5-stage design thinking process (Empathize-Define-Ideate-Prototype-Test) to create a learner needs analysis report
Apply empathic interview techniques to identify ≥3 language learning barrier factors among target learners
Develop ≥1 learner-tailored language education solution prototype based on empathy mapping results
Improve the final instructional design ≥1 time by incorporating formative assessment feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
